summary:
After analyzing the website https://www.werkzoeken.nl/vacatures/?filtered=1&from-company-profile=&what=Data+Scientist&r=50&where=Horst&salary=&date=&vacancyid=14621104, hereâ€™s what information can be scraped:

content_zones.description: Individual job postings displayed as cards or list items
Filter options for refining job searches by criteria like location, salary, date posted

structural_characteristics: Repeating card-based layout for individual job listings
Use of anchor tags within headings for job titles
Semantic class names indicating content types (e.g., .company-name, .location)
scraping_challenges: Potential JavaScript-rendered content requiring headless browser automation
Possible CAPTCHA or bot detection mechanisms causing access issues
Dynamic loading of job listings through pagination or infinite scroll
